name: PuzzleSquare
description:
A Chinese Traditional Ink-style Puzzle Game

  • Simple controls, only requires arrow keys
  • Overlap yin and yang symbols to progress
  • Rich themes, introducing new mechanics in each chapter
  • Challenge yourself to complete each level in the fewest number of moves
  • Collect all achievements for a greater challenge

Hope you enjoy this puzzle game if you're a fan of puzzle-solving!
